column1: Want my thoughts on the most recent events related to #impeachment? Tune in to @FoxNews. I'll be on with @TeamCavuto soon.

🚨 CALL TO ACTION 🚨  Members of the impeachment movement let's bend the arc of the moral universe toward justice by showing up for the Senate trial or by contacting Senators and making our voices heard.  #ShowUpForJustice #SpeakUpForJustice
From today's hearing... @HomelandDems  https://t.co/AfRaLntvx8
The world is watching. The Senate has an obligation to the country to have a fair impeachment trial.   https://t.co/pMcOdvptuK
We need a Senate impeachment trial NOT a Senate impeachment briefing.   The people of this country will have the last word.  https://t.co/gB5sw9juN5
From today's full committee hearing... @FSCDems  https://t.co/6XFB1LWTNi
Are you watching the House Floor on @cspan? 👀 I'm speaking now. Tune in if you can.

It's often difficult to take the President seriously on issues related to border security when U.S. taxpayers are currently paying for the border wall for which he said Mexico would pay.  @HomelandDems  https://t.co/0Ta9COB2YK

Mr. President what is wrong with you?   How can you allow the aid that has been signed and sealed by Congress for Puerto Rico not to be delivered? We must send the aid approved for our brothers and sisters in Puerto Rico now.   https://t.co/KHYKDjVgDI
From today's hearing... @HomelandDems   https://t.co/qHoDGitVUd

When presented I will vote FOR the War Powers Resolution & affirm the balance of power granted by the Constitution. If you want #NoWarWithIran make your voice heard. Let’s take the high road to peace not the low road to war.
Hope you’ll be watching @cspan for morning hour speeches with Members of the House. It starts at 10 AM ET/9 AM CST and I’ll be speaking for the first time this year/decade. Don’t miss it.

Are we in an undeclared war with Iran? Has our Secretary of State become the Secretary of War? President Putin is meeting with our allies to prevent war. Has Putin become Secretary of Peace? Is the U.S. no longer the world’s peacekeeper? #QTNA  https://t.co/4ZgeSFhviI
Houston I’m live on @FOX26Houston with @isiahcareyFOX26 tonight! Catch us soon at 10:30 AM CST.
Live from Mevo https://t.co/HK6m3WxQzw
.@davidgura has invited me on this morning to discuss a few current events. Tune in to @MSNBC to watch.
Hope you’ll be watching. https://t.co/dnY1Khe1M7
The people deserve a fair not a fake impeachment trial in the Senate. The hands of history will not be kind to those who impose a fake trial and the hands of voters will not forget them.
Hope you’ll be watching. https://t.co/dtwnnR1rDJ
.@repjohnlewis for decades you have fought for us. Now we will fight with you. May the courage & inspiration you’ve given so many of us sustain you. Dear brother we are here for you.
A society that tolerates hate is a society that perpetuates hate. Until we perceive hate against one as hate against all we are all at risk. #MonseyAttack #WhiteSettlementShooting
Want my #SundayThoughts? Tune in to Weekends with @AlexWitt on @MSNBC. I’ll be on shortly.
Houston tune in to @Majic1021 right now. I’m on Sunday Morning Live with Marcus Davis.   #SundayMorning  https://t.co/baT4TJETtb
https://t.co/gc3i0WfRQE
Peace & blessings to the celebrants of #Hanukkah. May this special time be filled with cheer & thanksgiving. #HanukkahSameach
We must not allow the gamesmanship of politics to overshadow the statesmanship of our moral imperative.
Want my thoughts on yesterday’s impeachment? Tune in to @MadisonSiriusXM now!   #Impeached45
No one is above justice in this country.   #ImpeachmentDay   https://t.co/EpPO5PnfsD

#ImpeachmentDay is a day to defend our democracy and protect our republic. It highlights our love of country.  We are at the crossroads of accountability. Either we hold the President accountable or be held accountable.
Hope you’re watching @democracynow! I’ll be on soon.   #ImpeachmentDay

The Chief Justice of the Supreme Court should not legitimize an impeachment trial where it is perceived that the Republican President and the Republican Senate Majority Leader are engaging in collusion and coverups.   #McConnellTrumpCoverup

Congrats on 100 years @MethodistHosp! Thanks to my Houston colleagues for your bipartisan support in honoring this milestone. @JacksonLeeTX18 @RepMcCaul @RepPeteOlson @TXRandy14 @RepBrianBabin @RepKevinBrady @RepDanCrenshaw @RepFletcher @RepSylviaGarcia  https://t.co/rFFC6TmKtp
Catch me live on the House Floor via @cspan at 10 AM ET/9 AM CT.

The question isn't whether the House will impeach the question is whether the Senate will uphold its constitutional duty to convict and remove a constitutionally unfit president from office.  #ImpeachAndConvictTrump

I pray that we soon end this ignoble time in presidential history by not only impeaching President Trump but also removing him from office.   #ArticlesOfImpeachment  #ImpeachAndConvictTrump   https://t.co/76b57x3fB8
Tune in to the House Floor via @cspan at 10 AM ET/9 AM CT. I will address the  #ArticlesOfImpeachment and more.   #ImpeachmentIsNotDead

My colleague @RepVanTaylor and I passed H.R. 4713 to improve the accountability transparency and responsibility of a key @DHSgov agency. For more info on the bill as well as comments on its passage from Rep. Taylor and I visit https://t.co/KvIJFXkmrj

I offer my sincere condolences to the family friends and colleagues of HPD Sgt. Christopher Brewster. Our hearts are heavy as we mourn this tragic loss.   Sgt. Brewster thank you for your heroic service. May you rest in peace.   @houstonpolice @ArtAcevedo
Watch @MSNBC with @AlexWitt for my #SaturdayThoughts.   I’ll be on in minutes discussing #impeachment.
https://t.co/9A68idsFLO

The impeachment process isn’t about schadenfreude - finding pleasure in someone’s misfortune.  It’s about doing what is right out of love for country.   Whether safe or politic or popular it is time for Congress to do what is right.   #ImpeachNow #Impeachment
Watch the House Floor at 10 AM ET/9 AM CT on @cspan.  I'll be among the first to speak.
Those who discredit the #impeachment of Andrew Johnson in 1868 discredit impeachment rooted in racism.   #Impeach President Trump for his racism anti-Semitism Islamophobia transphobia and xenophobia.
Good morning all! Catch me on @cspanwj during the 8 AM ET/7 AAM CT hour. I’ll be discussing #impeachment.   For my latest thoughts visit https://t.co/XFydjHLaEH.   #ImpeachingHearings

We cannot have the output of people of color without the input of people of color. It's about fairness. It's about reflecting the richness of diversity in our Nation. #ImpeachmentHearing   https://t.co/vwN9ZRFZXw
House Floor speeches will commence at 10 AM ET/9 AM CST on @cspan.  I'll be speaking. Will you be watching?  #Impeachment
Catch me on FOX with @TeamCavuto in about 20 minutes. I'll be discussing #impeachment! Tune in if you can.  #ImpeachNow
To National Security Advisor John Bolton:  Now is the time for all people of good will to come to the aid of their country.   #DoTheRightThing
Need something to do for the next hour?   Watch @TheRevAl on @MSNBC starting now. I’ll be on shortly discussing #impeachment.
Missed the Floor this morning? Watch this clip where I presented my amendment to H.R. 1309 here.  https://t.co/cEDJc8OnKQ
We must be for the people NOT for the President. #ForThePeople   https://t.co/Amp8g24033

Mr. President @SpeakerPelosi isn’t crazy. We are not trying to change the voting system. We are defending the democracy from your corruption and coverups bigotry and bribery. You are unfit and you will be impeached. #impeachment https://t.co/eULlBZd9Eo

The Reforming Disaster Recovery Act of 2019 just passed the House! Thanks to my cosponsor @RepAnnWagner for her bipartisan partnership @RepMaxineWaters for her leadership on @FSCDems and @LeaderHoyer for his support in shaping this bill and getting it to the Floor.
Are you watching the House Floor? 👀  I'm currently managing @FSCDems suspensions.   Tune in on @cspan.

Mr. President your partner in shame Roger Stone has been found #guilty for his attempts to prevent a House investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 election.   If you pardon him it will only increase the likelihood of the inevitable - your impeachment.  #ImpeachNow

Friends when the President engages in witness intimidation as the witness testifies before Congress it’s about more than his contemptible behavior. It’s about the Congress that allows him to continue his abuse of power and disregard for his oath of office. #ImpeachmentHearings
Missed my #ExIm comments on the Floor? Watch here:  https://t.co/DLjHwDk82O
Are you watching the Floor on @cspan? My colleagues and I are discussing the Export-Import Bank now.  I support the #ExIm Bank.

The wounded as well as the family and friends of the one whose life was tragically taken in the Santa Clarita shooting deserve not only our thoughts and prayers but also immediate action on gun legislation in the Senate.   #EnoughIsEnough
Tune in to @cspan now for special orders on the House Floor. I’m speaking.
When a president attempts to weaponize racism bigotry xenophobia Islamophobia and homophobia that president ought to be impeached and he will be.  #ImpeachmentHearings   https://t.co/VMza8ciV5m
Tune in to @cspan for morning hour on the House Floor. I’ll be speaking very soon.

Today our grateful Nation thanks those who risk their lives & make countless sacrifices to protect the lives of others. However #FreedomIsntFree. In the days to come we must fund quality mental health services & homelessness prevention for veterans. Happy Veterans Day!#ThankAVet

Mr. President our Nation must protect  judges Members of Congress religious groups LGBTQIA+ persons minorities women and now a whistleblower from your attacks. Any country that must protect its people and institutions from its President must impeach. #ImpeachNow

#DearPresidentTrump 30yrs ago the invidious Berlin Wall was torn down to unite people reform human rights and civil liberties. Sadly today we must work to tear down your invidious walls of hate harmful to our country. #Impeachnow

Today @HomelandDems host the field hearing on "Immigration Raids: Impacts and Aftermath on Mississippi Communities" 3 months after the largest single-state immigration raid in our Nation’s history. Watch here:  https://t.co/FvFRCHfXt0
Members are currently debating H.R. 660 the impeachment inquiry resolution. Read my thoughts on this historic vote here:   https://t.co/I95jkoVkvj
Are you watching? 👀  I’m discussing invidious discrimination targeted at different marginalized communities.  Tune in to @cspan now to watch the Floor LIVE. https://t.co/r0184eAMuz
Tune in to @cspan. I’ll be speaking on the Floor for the Special Order Hour soon.
Tune in LIVE to watch the @FSCDems Subcommittee on Oversight & Investigations hearing on financial services in the LGBTQ+ community. https://t.co/d6rW46cUbm
Tune in. I’ll be on to discuss the life of @RepJohnConyers (1929-2019). https://t.co/NyjzKpR9jI
Catch me LIVE on @MSNBC with @AlexWitt very soon!   #Baghdadi  #Impeachment
Mr. President long after you are gone the hate you’ve engendered will live on. You must be impeached for the harmful hate you propagate.   #ImpeachNow for hate.   https://t.co/y0d1lxpAgR
Missed my @FSCDems Q&A with #Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg? Watch it here.   https://t.co/nlZE50zuUZ
Are you watching? 👀  #ImpeachNow https://t.co/xsDcSNCpCJ
Stay tuned to @cspan. I will not only speak. I will respond to the comments by Republican Members on the Floor. https://t.co/KF39gGlzTG

Tune into @cspan immediately following this hour’s one-minute speeches. I will continue my thoughts on the President’s inaccurate comparison of lawful impeachment to the hateful practice of lynching. #ImpeachNow

Today @RepJudyChu @RepSylviaGarcia @LacyClayMO1 & I introduced the Limited English Proficiency Data Acquisition in Mortgage Lending Act to reinstate the preferred-language question on the Universal Residential Loan Application. Read more about it here: https://t.co/jGYP6tcgYc

Yesterday my colleagues from @TheBlackCaucus and I commemorated the life of our dear brother @RepCummings with heartfelt words on the Floor of the House of Representatives. He is truly missed.   #RestInPeaceElijah  https://t.co/RgyyvAcMHq
How dare you Mr. President? #ImpeachNow  https://t.co/y4C6WOQqcU
Tune into @cspan LIVE between 10 and 10:30 AM ET for my message on the Floor. #ImpeachNow

Mr. President HOW DARE YOU compare impeachment to lynching (the mob murdering and racist terrorizing of Black people)?   Your continuing to weaponize hate make you no better than the bigots who screamed "blood and soil" in Charlottesville. #ImpeachNow
https://t.co/XqB20bkn4h

Tune in now. I’ll be on to discuss the life of Rep. Elijah Cummings my brother and friend.  #RestInPeaceElijah   https://t.co/zvRFOgL7Lu
Rest in power wise warrior and seeker of peace. Dear brother you made the world a better place. https://t.co/fRl03k0pjz

Could pulling our military out of Syria precipitously be a ruthless reckless presidential deep state distraction designed to divert attention from the lawful and inevitable impeachment of an unfit president? #ImpeachNow

We are now in a deep state cover-up caused by the President AG and Sec of State among others. Congress we must not allow the paralysis of analysis to prevent us from honoring the Constitution protecting democracy and preserving the republic. #ContemptOfCongress #ImpeachNow
Back on for part 2. Questions? Call in at 713-668-1230!   #ImpeachNow  https://t.co/8aW56HxVH5
“I think that bigotry should not be off the table as it relates to this President.” #ImpeachNow  Tune in LIVE on Facebook or on AM 1230 if you’re in Houston. https://t.co/U0grYRwnNU
Please watch LIVE. Listen on your radio on AM 1230 in Houston.  https://t.co/Lr1uke80i6

Catch me LIVE on FOX with @TeamCavuto. I’ll be on in minutes discussing #impeachment.

Mr. President withholding congressionally authorized funds to thwart Russian aggression in Ukraine while your personal attorney confers with Ukrainian officials to get dirt on a political opponent is an impeachable abuse of power. #ImpeachNow
Catch me LIVE on https://t.co/DdSTze6xHy at 10 AM CST/11 AM ET discussing #ImpeachmentNow.

Mr. President maliciously attacking a whistleblower and promoting civil unrest to avoid impeachment won't save you. You should have already been impeached for your bigotry corruption and disloyalty to our country. #CivilWar2 #ImpeachNow

Happy #RoshHashanah to all followers of the Jewish faith across the world! I hope year 5780 is filled with joy and prosperity and that you are remembered in the Book of Life for all years to come. Shana Tova!
Catch me LIVE on @MSNBC with @AlexWitt at 12 PM CST/1 PM ET. #ImpeachNow

Gun violence has taken the life of a first responder in Houston. As we send our thoughts and prayers to the family and @HCSOTexas colleagues of Deputy Sandeep Dhaliwal during this time of tragedy we must also continue the fight to end gun violence.
There are times when we must impeach the President to protect the presidency and our Nation. This is such a time. #ImpeachNow

Please watch "The People vs. Donald Trump" mock hearing and rally hosted by By The People. #ImpeachNow  https://t.co/Q1oO9ffnMM

Although I will work with this administration on meaningful legislation and substantive issues I will NOT foster the false impression that my impeachment fight has ended by attending the #HowdyModi event that President Trump may use as a photo op.  https://t.co/46AduQDPfM

#Houston has braved another ruthless flood but we need more than thoughts/prayers to recover. When disasters strike we need timely & efficient government aid. The Green-Wagner Bill which unanimously passed the Financial Services Committee will codify & reform CDBG-DR funding.

#Imelda reminds us of our dire need for flood insurance. Yesterday I proudly supported H.R. 4378 which extends the National Flood Insurance Program until 11/21. I will continue to work with my colleagues to pass long-term authorization making flood insurance more accessible.
Watch here for my questions and remarks at yesterday’s congressional hearing on white nationalism:  https://t.co/auKIH12RSu
We must stand on principles and impeach this President. #ImpeachmentHearing #ImpeachNow  https://t.co/VguiTnO3Ke
Please tune into @cspan at the top of the 9 AM CST/10 AM ET hour. I will address the Judiciary Committee’s #ImpeachmentHearing.

This administration prioritizes the wealthiest 1% overlooking the majority of Americans. The #PublicCharge rule is NO different! We refuse to allow the values of our Nation to be misrepresented. Join @TheBlackCaucus @CAPAC @HispanicCaucus by saying #NoToPublicCharge.

Of the nearly 26M immigrants that could be denied access to our Nation by this administration's expansion of #PublicCharge 70% are Latinx - a group @realDonaldTrump has consistently targeted. We must not allow hate to become our policy. #ProtectFamilies

With dog whistle rhetoric like "Go back" freely and openly stated by the President it is clear how #PublicCharge can be rooted in invidious discrimination. This rule could disproportionately affect immigrants of color. I stand for immigration WITHOUT invidious discrimination.

America stands for something larger than itself: freedom unity and inclusion as universal principles by which we lead the world. The President's #PublicCharge rule threatens these values. Stand with @TheBlackCaucus @CAPAC @HispanicCaucus. Say #NoToPublicCharge. #ProtectFamilies

It‘s no surprise @realDonaldTrump who promoted birther conspiracies about President Obama who claimed there were nice people among the bigots and racists in Charlottesville and who consistently engages in perfidy would tweet another untruth. I never said that.
Because no one is above the law we must impeach and if the Senate does not convict we will defeat. @realDonaldTrump You will NOT have a second term! #ImpeachNow https://t.co/PBDB2Dba6V
#NeverForget https://t.co/UtU2P4ZeBe

As a @TexasSouthern alumnus it is an honor to know the third 2020 Democratic presidential debates will be held there. This debate shines a light on HBCUs as highly competitive inclusive and worth America's investment for longevity and sustainability. https://t.co/2aUsIz23T5
This morning I’ll be speaking from the Floor of the House of Representatives. Please watch on @cspan during the 9 AM CST/10 AM ET hour.

18 years ago our Nation experienced one of the saddest days in its history. We pay homage to the nearly 3000 first responders & civilians who lost their lives on #September11 by resiliently standing in their honor today. We must defy ALL acts of terror both foreign & domestic.
Suicidal thoughts do not discriminate. If you or a loved one needs any support please contact 1-800-273-8255 for 24/7 assistance. #WorldSuicidePreventionDay
The President will be impeached. #ImpeachNow https://t.co/Q78Cy0K4ky
And still I rise on the Floor of the House of Representatives with a special message today. Please watch on @cspan during the 9 AM CST/10 AM ET hour.
Dear @WellsFargo do the right thing and hire a woman person of color or openly LGBTQ+ CEO. #DiversityMatters
Catch me LIVE on @MSNBC with @TheRevAl at 4 PM CST/5 PM ET.

Until those with the power to take action conclude that the solution to gun violence and mass shootings is NOT more guns regretfully we will continue to have more gun violence and mass shootings. #EndGunViolence #NotOneMore

Tune in LIVE to watch the @FSCDems Subcommittee on Oversight & Investigations Hearing on “Examining Discrimination and Other Barriers to Consumer Credit Homeownership and Financial Inclusion in Texas.” https://t.co/aDKDz8ChWz

Houston tune in LIVE as my colleagues @repgregorymeeks & @repcleaver join me with @isiahcareyfox26 to discuss tomorrow’s congressional field hearing being held in Houston on “Examining Discrimination and Other Barriers in Consumer Credit Homeownership and Financial Inclusion.” https://t.co/vjPjPYrm0N

El Paso. Dayton. Odessa. All in 1 month. How many more lives must be lost before Congress takes action? While our prayers are with Odessa during this time of despair and disbelief thoughts and prayers will never fully suffice in the wake of tragedies. #TexasShooting #NotOneMore

Happy New #Hijri Year! I commemorated this day by filing a resolution recognizing Islam as a great religion of the world cosponsored by the 3 Muslim Mems. of Cong. @RepAndreCarson @Ilhan @RepRashida. It was my honor to present the resolution to a welcoming crowd at #isnacon2019. https://t.co/zqrAuTgtFF
Mr. Neil Cavuto thank you for standing up to the bully behind the bully pulpit. We must protect the free press from an unrestrained and out of control President. #NeilCavuto
In case you missed it... #ImpeachNow  @MSNBC @allinwithchris  https://t.co/B8l7ROwq4d
Catch me LIVE on @MSNBC with @allinwithchris at 7 PM CST/8 PM ET.

From vile comments to calling Congresswomen "wacky" "low IQ" and inciting "send her back" chants the President treats women with incivility. #EqualityCantWait  We must continue to work until such invidious misogyny is more than condemnable. #ImpeachNow #WomensEqualityDay

We waited for the Mueller Report concerning President Trump. Mueller did not indict citing a DOJ policy which claims a sitting president cannot be indicted. Congress has condemned his incitive behavior. We must hold the President accountable or be held accountable. #ImpeachNow

I am calling on Members of the Senate to take up the Paycheck Fairness Act that was passed by the House with bipartisan support in April. We must end discriminatory pay practices NOW! #EqualPayEqualWork

The President continues to boast about the economy under his administration but with a wage gap that disproportionately affects women of color our economy is not boast-worthy for all. #PayBlackWomen #EqualPayEqualWork

Working mothers are not only responsible for working to provide for their families but also for coming home to care for their children. However most Black mothers make far less than the estimated necessary income level for infant care. #PayBlackWomen

In 2017 Black women earned only 61 cents for every dollar earned by White men. In a country that stands for liberty and justice for all a wage gap sustained by race and gender should not exist. This is unacceptable! #EqualPayEqualWork

In 1868 Republicans impeached President Andrew Johnson for racist incitement harmful to society. What will WE do in 2019 about President Donald Trump inciting hateful bigotry and harming society? #ImpeachNow https://t.co/mKaldpmkMs

The President has unleashed bigotry. It is our duty to not only restrain and contain but also eliminate it. The genesis of doing this must be the impeachment of the person who unleashed the bigotry that is causing death and destruction within our society. #ImpeachNow

The success of Africans in America from 1619 to 2019 is the greatest story never told. 'Tis the continuing story of people of goodwill of all stripes who have fought racism segregation and invidious discrimination and we WILL NOT allow ANYONE to turn us around! #Jamestown400
Tonight I spoke at the @MomsDemand Houston #RecessRally to call for Congress to reconvene immediately and pass comprehensive gun legislation. https://t.co/on9wO1WQwi

Tonight I spoke at the @MomsDemand Houston #RecessRally to call for Congress to reconvene immediately and pass comprehensive gun legislation. In case you missed it watch this clip. https://t.co/KHot1fMeTs

Mr. President by encouraging the barring of Congress Members @RepRashida & @Ilhan from Israel or any other country you're placing your personal politics above U.S. national interests. It is anti-American undemocratic and further evidence of why YOU ARE UNFIT TO BE PRESIDENT.

Today’s @FSCDems field hearing was extremely informative. Homelessness is in many ways an un-natural disaster that conflates mental health addiction invidious discrimination and affordable housing crises. I look forward to continuing to tackle these issues in Congress. https://t.co/Qjo8wQA7De

Today I join @RepMaxineWaters and @FSCDems for a field hearing on homelessness and the affordable housing crisis in Los Angeles which disproportionately affects people of color LGBTQ+ youth and veterans. Tune in to watch LIVE via https://t.co/GdN8XEwjuN. https://t.co/nqNrdi4DMt

Mr. President are we replacing our time-honored pledge on the Statue of Liberty that reads “give me your tired your poor your huddled masses yearning to breathe free” with “government of the people by the people for the WEALTHY”??? #PublicChargeRule #ProtectFamilies

From the white supremacist attack on #HeatherHeyer to the El Paso white nationalist massacre we see how hate kills. We must not only place the indelible stain of impeachment for bigotry on this President but also on his hateful philosophy making both unacceptable. #ImpeachTrump
Congressman Al Green Public Forum on Gun Violence  https://t.co/rOZdUteIRP

The suicide of Mr. Epstein is an impossibilty. When an impossiblty occurs involving powerful people and possible criminality there must be an investigation to end speculation. Because the public has a right to know I’m calling for a congressional investigation. #JefferyEpstein
Catch me LIVE on @CNN shortly as I discuss impeachment in the wake of this week’s tragic events with @jimsciutto.
Catch me LIVE on @MSNBC shortly as I discuss the El Paso and Dayton shootings with @allinwithchris.

Today we commemorate the life of one of the world’s greatest humanitarians. Mickey Leland was a stalwart for equality and justice for those often deemed the least last and lost. Although we mourn his passing on this day 30 years ago his legacy transcends time.
Catch me LIVE on @CNN shortly as I discuss the El Paso and Dayton shootings.

Mr. President if you're going to #ElPaso to save face admit you were wrong for demonizing Latinos. If you're going to denounce white nationalist terrorism it's 22 deaths too late. You must do more. If you're going to promote your personal politics don't go. #DoTheRightThing

Horse-mounted policemen shamelessly parading a Black man handcuffed & hitched to their horse by rope down the streets of #Galveston is bad policy & bad policing. Mr. President is this what you meant on 7/28/2017 when you told police "don't be too nice" when arresting people?
Congressman Al Green Demands Action After the El Paso and Dayton Shootings https://t.co/tBSH7OScAy

Because I love humanity I send my expressions of condolences sympathies & prayers to the families & victims of all mass shootings. Because I love my country I have sent today’s tweets calling for action to our President. #EnoughIsEnough #DaytonShooting #ElPasoTerroristAttack

Mr. President because you have dishonored our country by continually promoting white nationalistic hate and because you will not honor our country by resigning from the Presidency you leave us with but one immediate choice. #ImpeachNow #EnoughIsEnough
Mr. President condemning the white nationalist terrorists only addresses the effect. You must condemn white nationalism to eliminate the cause. #EnoughIsEnough #WhiteNationalistTerrorism

Mr. President show some moral leadership:  1. Condemn the NRA 2. Condemn white nationalism 3. Declare a national emergency 4. Call for Congress to end the August recess and deal with our domestic terrorism emergency #EnoughIsEnough #DaytonShooting #ElPasoTerroristAttack

Tune in to watch as I Chair the @FSCDems Oversight & Investigations Subcommittee hearing on the housing crisis in Michigan with my colleagues @RepRashida @LaCongresista @RepLawrence @RepDebDingell via https://t.co/wZeje1fKNT

With a majority of House Democrats on board for an impeachment inquiry the question is no longer who will be among the first to sign on but rather who will be among the last to sign on to impeach an unfit president. #ImpeachNow

The President’s shameful comments about Congressman Cummings make it evident that his bigotry is not going away. We can no longer tolerate it and condemnation by the House of Representatives clearly wasn’t enough. We must impeach. #ImpeachNow
We cannot allow the President's bigotry against the people of Baltimore to go unchallenged. #BaltimoreStrong #ImpeachNow
Throwing water or anything else on the police is not only disrespectful but unlawful and punishable. We cannot allow this abusive behavior to become acceptable. #ProtectGoodCops #ReportBadCops
